Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory9.jpg'}
{2: 'Suzaku Squad Construct', 3: 'Urgh...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "His body structure is compromised all over, I'll have to perform emergency treatment...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "After you're done, put him near the Iso-Device. If he can't recover his memory... You can only hope that he can hold on until the Purifying Force arrives.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suzaku Squad Construct', 3: '...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm sorry, but we can't stay by your side.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So please, do not leave the Iso-Device field.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait. Those Corrupted ahead are behaving... strangely...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Corrupted', 3: 'Urgh—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Even if the Corrupted here are stronger than those outside, they should still be susceptible to damage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'There are... strange devices inside these Corrupted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's... the core modules of Iso-Devices...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So you mean, they gained new abilities by corrupting the Iso-Devices?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This is severe. Iso-Device corruption... HQ didn't mention any of this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "So that's why the Iso-Devices were sealed off before we arrived.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But then, how should we deal with these new Corrupted?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Connecting—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hi, hi! Gray Ravens!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just a kind little reminder—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'There are several... tricky folks heading toward your way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What a timely reminder—those "tricky folks" are already right here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So you don't need a little tip then?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph. Their shields can be neutralized by the Iso-Devices. If you want to destroy them, you'll need to do it within the Iso-Device fields.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Stop with the act. You left them for us intentionally.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh my... You caught me. After all, dealing with these things would slow us down tremendously.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Well then, give it your best! I'll be seeing you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Hold on. Don't you have anything else to add?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph. Since when did you become so fussy... That won't make you very popular with the ladies.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Sorry, but that's none of your concern.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Al-right, I\'ll give you a little something in return. A "wish ticket" from Cerberus whenever you need help or something.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't even try this. Don't expect us to clean up your mess for an empty promise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I was naive to even think that you'd feel apologetic for anything—your actions are going in the mission report.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "Aha, that's even less trouble for us—Tifa's getting a little bit out of hand and just slipped through our fingers, so I'll have to go. I'll miss chatting with you, dear. So lo-ong.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Disconnected—'}
